AzureBlade: He didn't say much, he is still Nightstrike. He got 
damaged in our encounter, so I will repair him. Just a minute...

He presses some buttons, and the nanobots then start repairing the 
decepticon.

AzureBlade: Oh, hello Pegatron. Good to meet you.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...> wrote:
> Pegatron: Hi....So what's up?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > OOc: repair him but not reprogram.
> > 
> > Alphah/Nightstrike
> > 
> > Nighstrike fell in stasis lock,ALphah said "Azure he's Pegatron... 
> > Pegatron he's aZure" after that she added "What did he said?? did 
> he 
> > remember us?"
